form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Labor to publish on an Internet Web site certain information about the number of veterans who are employed by Federal contractors.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Employment Promotion Act.

section.header: Publication of data on employment of certain veterans by Federal contractors
section.text: Section 4212(d) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: The Secretary of Labor shall establish and maintain an Internet Web site on which the Secretary shall publicly disclose the information reported to the Secretary of Labor by contractors under paragraph (1).
